name: Banjo Battie
description:
Navigate a catacomb full of dangerous creatures and ancient devices using your bombs to make your way through the rubble.

Try to reach the very end of this dungeon by jumping into a hole in the ground at each level.

Created with Monogame for Mini Jam 32.

Controls:

WASD - Move your character/Select a menu option

Spacebar - Place a bomb/Confirm a menu option

Credits:

Ceuteum - Programming, Level design

Shin - Art, Lead game design, Level design

sat9 - Sound, Music, the tiniest bit of programming
